name: Rival Racing
description:
1v1 split screen racer 

Sci Fi themed

Need a controller for second player, other controller is keyboard 

Controls for the controller (P2)

         A = Accelerate

         B = Reverse/ Brake

         X = Handbrake

         Joystick = Steer

Keyboard (P1(You will be the one to navigate the game!))

          Arrow keys or WASD

          Spacebar = Handbrake

"Competitive gravity defying  racer"(Ryan the Programmer, 2019)
